plugins.name: 앱스토어 리뷰 추출기 (Appstpre Review Extractor)
plugins.description:
🧩 애플 앱스토어 리뷰를 Figma 프레임에 손쉽게 가져와 정리하세요

Easily import and organize Apple App Store reviews into your Figma frames


이 플러그인은 Apple App Store의 앱 리뷰를 가져와 평점별로 정리해줍니다.

사용자 피드백 분석, 제품 개선 준비, 인사이트 시각화 등 다양한 상황에서

실사용자 의견을 Figma 안에서 빠르고 효율적으로 표현할 수 있습니다.

→ This plugin fetches app reviews from the Apple App Store and organizes them by rating.

It's perfect for analyzing user feedback, planning improvements, and visualizing insights—all within Figma.


🔍 주요 기능 | Key Features

최근 평점별(5★, 4★ 등) 리뷰 가져오기 가능

→ Import recent reviews by rating (e.g., 5★, 4★)


현재 운영 중인 앱의 현황 확인, 고객의 pain point 확인

→ Check the current status of your app and identify user pain points


UX 리서치, 앱 디자인, 제품 문서화에 활용 가능

→ Use in UX research, app design, and product documentation


🛠 사용순서 | How to Use

1) 플러그인을 실행하세요

→ Launch the plugin


2) 사용하고자 하는 앱스토어 ID를 확인합니다

→ Find the App Store ID of your target app

(https://www.apple.com/kr/app-store/에서 앱 검색 후 주소창에 id숫자 확인/복사)

→ (Search the app on the App Store and copy the numeric id from the URL)


3) 해당 ID를 플러그인 입력창에 붙여넣습니다

→ Paste the ID into the plugin input field


4) 원하는 평점(예: 5★) 을 선택합니다

→ Select the desired rating (e.g., 5★)


5) "리뷰 불러오기" 버튼을 클릭합니다

→ Click the "Import Reviews" button

accepted.name: kenny
accepted.description: I am a designer who creates the tools and experiences that users truly need. I believe good design goes beyond visuals, flow and development.

plugins.tagline: App Store 리뷰를 한눈에, 피그마로 정리하자 (in Figma, Check your app review)

plugins.name: View Jumper
plugins.description: View Jumper helps designers quickly navigate large Figma files by creating visual bookmarks. Users set two key locations (View A and View B) that they need to reference frequently, then instantly teleport between them with preserved zoom levels and page context. Whether using the UI buttons, menu commands, or keyboard shortcuts, this plugin eliminates the frustration of constantly scrolling and searching through complex designs, making workflow significantly more efficient when comparing or referencing different areas.

accepted.name: Christopher
accepted.description:
Product Design @ heyo.is
Brand Design @ MARKoftheBRAND.com

plugins.tagline: Set viewpoints A & B. Teleport between design locations with a click.

plugins.name: LocalizeBuddy
plugins.description:
🌏 Introducing LocalizeBuddy for Figma — Your Ultimate i18n Export Companion!


LocalizeBuddy automatically extracts every text layer from your Figma file and converts it into clean, structured JSON—perfectly formatted for any localization pipeline. Skip the tedious copy-and-paste: design and ship faster with truly seamless internationalization. ✨


Standout Features:


🔍 Comprehensive Text Discovery

Auto-detects every text node, even deep inside groups, components, and nested frames.


🔑 Smart Key Mapping

Auto-generate consistent, position-based keys that mirror your design hierarchy—e.g. page1.frame2.text3—so every JSON entry is predictably unique without relying on layer-name transformations.


📂 Structured JSON Output

Preserve your art-board and frame hierarchy in the output to keep context clear for translators.


🖼️ Frame-Only Export

Export the selected frame in one click—ideal for precise, frame-level JSON extraction.

accepted.name: Alvin Bellero
accepted.description: Crafting code and building dreams, one line at a time 👨🏻‍💻🤞🚀

plugins.tagline: Effortless export Figma text layers as structured JSON in one click—instantly accelerate i18n setup!

133498.release_notes:
- Now supports `Section` Node text extraction
- Replace `Export to CSV` with `Export to Excel`
133498.tagline: Effortless export Figma text layers as structured JSON in one click—instantly accelerate i18n setup!

plugins.name: CTRLFRK:GRAD
plugins.description:
GRAD gives you unprecedented control over colour transitions through the power of Bezier curves. This sophisticated plugin brings laboratory-grade precision to your gradient work through highly-customisable curves. Manipulate how colours blend across HSB components, visualise transitions in real-time, and achieve interpolation paths that were previously impossible. Perfect for brand work, illustrations, and UI design where colour transitions matter.


  1. Create expressive colour gradients with precise Bezier curve control
  2. Independently manipulate hue, saturation, and brightness curves for nuanced transitions
  3. Apply preset curves (ease-in, ease-out, S-curves) for common gradient effects
  4. Visualise and fine-tune with an interactive interface
  5. Generate exact colour stops based on mathematical interpolation
  6. Apply gradients directly to selected objects or create new gradient rectangles
plugins.tagline: Precision gradient control for the colour obsessed

plugins.name: Bulk Renamer
plugins.description:
Bulk Renamer 2.0


A powerful, user-friendly tool for renaming multiple frames or components in one go.


Bulk Renamer 2.0 lets you paste a list of names (typed manually, copied from Excel, or generated elsewhere) and instantly apply them to your selected frames — in the exact order and direction you choose.


⸻


✨ Features:

•Rename frames by typing or pasting names

•Smart support for Excel/Sheets cell pastes

•Auto-adds commas only when you press Enter

•Supports left-to-right or top-to-bottom frame direction

•Real-time validation for name count vs frame selection

•Clean, dark-themed UI with live feedback


⸻


🪄 How to use:

1.Select your frames/components in Figma

2.Choose your naming direction

3.Paste or type names (one per line)

4.Click Apply to rename all selected items
plugins.tagline: Rename multiple frames all at once.

plugins.name: Section Logger
plugins.description: ¡No pierdas ni un cambio! Con Section Logger, cada modificación en tus secciones de Figma queda registrada automáticamente. Visualiza los cambios en tiempo real, guarda un historial detallado de tus ediciones y personaliza el diseño con colores que se ajustan a tu estilo. Ideal para equipos que buscan organización, colaboración y eficiencia. ¡Mejora tu flujo de trabajo ahora!
plugins.tagline: Transforma tu flujo de trabajo: registra, organiza y visualiza cambios de diseño veloz.

129666.name: Section Logger
129666.description: ¡No pierdas ni un cambio! Con Section Logger, cada modificación en tus secciones de Figma queda registrada automáticamente. Visualiza los cambios en tiempo real, guarda un historial detallado de tus ediciones y personaliza el diseño con colores que se ajustan a tu estilo. Ideal para equipos que buscan organización, colaboración y eficiencia. ¡Mejora tu flujo de trabajo ahora!
129666.release_notes:
Release Note: Versión 1.1

Nuevas funcionalidades:
1.Soporte de idioma (Español/Inglés):
•Se ha implementado un selector de idioma en la UI del plugin, que permite cambiar entre español e inglés con un switch/slider intuitivo.
•El idioma de la interfaz (títulos, botones y textos) cambia dinámicamente según la selección del usuario.
•El texto de los logs registrados también cambia de idioma, mostrando la información correctamente tanto en español como en inglés, dependiendo del idioma seleccionado.
2.Actualización de sticker:
•Mejora de la gestión de stickers: Ahora, si un sticker ya existe, se actualiza con los nuevos logs en lugar de crear uno nuevo cada vez que se registra una edición.
•Si el sticker ya está presente, su contenido se limpia y se reemplaza con los nuevos logs, garantizando que no haya stickers duplicados.

Mejoras adicionales:
•Se mejoró el posicionamiento dinámico del sticker, asegurando que se mantenga correctamente ubicado en la esquina superior izquierda de la sección.
•Se optimizó el código para hacer el plugin más eficiente y evitar la creación de stickers innecesarios.

Fixes:
•Se solucionó un problema en el que un nuevo sticker se creaba cada vez que se registraba un log, incluso si ya existía uno previamente.
129666.tagline: Transforma tu flujo de trabajo: registra, organiza y visualiza cambios de diseño veloz.

plugins.name: Boxy
plugins.description: Boxy is a simple Figma plugin that makes layout properties easy to see. It overlays visual indicators for padding, element sizes, and autolayouts gaps between components—perfect for quickly checking your work or handing off accurate specs to developers.

plugins.name: ColourSwatch
plugins.description:
Enhance your Figma workflow with the ColourSwatch plugin


Streamline the creation, management, and updating of colour swatches using local or published Figma colour variables. This plugin provides a clear visual overview of all the colours in your project, ensuring consistency and efficiency.


With this plugin, you can easily create a ColourSwatch component. For each colour variable —whether from a local collection or a linked, published Figma library — you can generate a component instance. Use the plugin to effortlessly update values such as hex codes, alpha values, and colour variable names — one by one or as a batch for all colour swatches on the same page.
plugins.tagline: Create maintain and update colour swatches based on your Figma colour variables.

127153.name: ColourSwatch
127153.description:
Enhance your Figma workflow with the ColourSwatch plugin


Streamline the creation, management, and updating of colour swatches using local or published Figma colour variables. This plugin provides a clear visual overview of all the colours in your project, ensuring consistency and efficiency.


With this plugin, you can easily create a ColourSwatch component. For each colour variable —whether from a local collection or a linked, published Figma library — you can generate a component instance. Use the plugin to effortlessly update values such as hex codes, alpha values, and colour variable names — one by one or as a batch for all colour swatches on the same page.

networkAccess.reasoning: No network access needed for the plugin.

127153.tagline: Create maintain and update colour swatches based on your Figma colour variables.

plugins.name: Quanta Symphony Design Review
plugins.description:
The Automated Design Review Checklist ensures that UI/UX designs maintain high standards of organization, accessibility, layout, and content quality. It systematically evaluates design files to identify potential issues and improve usability.


In terms of Layer Organization, it checks for clear and descriptive layer names, flagging defaults like “Rectangle 1,” “Text 1,” “Frame,” or “Group.” It also detects hidden layers, ensures layers used as masks are correctly applied, and verifies the presence of effects to maintain design consistency.


For Accessibility, the checklist validates text contrast ratios against WCAG 2.1 standards to ensure readability:

•Regular text (< 18px) must have a minimum contrast ratio of 4.5:1.

•Large text (≥ 18px or ≥ 14px bold) should meet a minimum contrast ratio of 3:1.

It also warns if text size is below 14px, flags elements smaller than 24x24px (as they might be too small for touch targets), and checks for opacity settings that could impact visibility.


The Layout Review identifies problematic scale constraints that could cause resizing issues and evaluates layer dimensions to ensure usability across different screen sizes.


In terms of Content, the system detects empty text layers that may indicate missing information and checks text properties to maintain proper styling, readability, and hierarchy.


By automating these design checks, this system helps designers streamline their workflow, ensuring consistency, accessibility, and overall design quality before final delivery.
plugins.tagline: Automate. Validate. Elevate.

127028.name: Quanta Symphony Design Review
127028.description:
The Automated Design Review Checklist ensures that UI/UX designs maintain high standards of organization, accessibility, layout, and content quality. It systematically evaluates design files to identify potential issues and improve usability.


In terms of Layer Organization, it checks for clear and descriptive layer names, flagging defaults like “Rectangle 1,” “Text 1,” “Frame,” or “Group.” It also detects hidden layers, ensures layers used as masks are correctly applied, and verifies the presence of effects to maintain design consistency.


For Accessibility, the checklist validates text contrast ratios against WCAG 2.1 standards to ensure readability:

•Regular text (< 18px) must have a minimum contrast ratio of 4.5:1.

•Large text (≥ 18px or ≥ 14px bold) should meet a minimum contrast ratio of 3:1.

It also warns if text size is below 14px, flags elements smaller than 24x24px (as they might be too small for touch targets), and checks for opacity settings that could impact visibility.


The Layout Review identifies problematic scale constraints that could cause resizing issues and evaluates layer dimensions to ensure usability across different screen sizes.


In terms of Content, the system detects empty text layers that may indicate missing information and checks text properties to maintain proper styling, readability, and hierarchy.


By automating these design checks, this system helps designers streamline their workflow, ensuring consistency, accessibility, and overall design quality before final delivery.

networkAccess.reasoning: The plugin needs to access external resources for WCAG contrast checking and design pattern validation.

plugins.name: Renamer
plugins.description:
Renamer — Smarter Layer Naming


A Figma plugin that keeps your layers organized by automatically generating clear, descriptive names based on their properties. Perfect for maintaining a consistent and readable file structure in complex designs.


Just select your layers and run the plugin — names will be updated instantly based on your settings.


Layer properties included:

  1. Dimensions (width × height)
  2. Fill color (HEX code)
  3. Opacity values
  4. Effects (shadows, blurs)
  5. Constraints
  6. Corner radius
  7. Stroke details
  8. Auto Layout settings

accepted.name: Pavel Grachev
accepted.description: Product designer. Focused on clarity, usability, and quality design systems.

plugins.tagline: Automatically rename layers based on design properties

plugins.name: Outset Pr Invoice Plugin
plugins.description:
Invoice Filler Plugin for Outset PR


This plugin is specifically designed for Outset PR and works exclusively with their internal invoice template in Figma. It automates the process of populating the template with data submitted via the plugin’s form, streamlining the invoicing workflow for the company.


How It Works:


The plugin is built to integrate with a single invoice template used by Outset PR.

Users submit invoice data through the plugin's form.

The plugin then automatically fills the predefined fields in the Outset PR invoice template within Figma.


Limitation for Reviewers:


Since the plugin is tailored for Outset PR's proprietary invoice template, reviewers will not have access to the template for testing.


For Figma Reviewers:


To review the functionality of the plugin, please use mock data in the form. The plugin will generate a dummy page with the entered data displayed.

If you are a member of the Figma team, please fill out the form and review the data generated by the plugin to understand its intended functionality.


Key Features:


Specifically designed for Outset PR’s invoice template, allowing users to quickly populate the template with the required data.

Simplifies the invoicing process for Outset PR by eliminating manual data entry.

Optimized for seamless integration with a single internal template used by the company.
plugins.tagline: A plugin to fill invoices

plugins.name: Diopter
plugins.description:
This plugin helps you see how you are using remote components for linked and unlinked libraries. For example, you can find mobile components in a file with only desktop explorations. With a tool like this, you can being spring cleaning now and get your files squeaky clean.


To use this plugin, you'll need to create a personal access token with read-only access to files. I needed that token to be able to get details about file libraries—e.g., library name. The first time you run the plugin, you'll be asked to paste the token.
plugins.tagline: Clearly see which components you're using and where they come from.

127509.name: Diopter
127509.description:
This plugin helps you see how you are using remote components for linked and unlinked libraries. For example, you can find mobile components in a file with only desktop explorations. With a tool like this, you can being spring cleaning now and get your files squeaky clean.


To use this plugin, you'll need to create a personal access token with read-only access to files. I needed that token to be able to get details about file libraries—e.g., library name. The first time you run the plugin, you'll be asked to paste the token.
127509.release_notes: Adds a way to find frames that used to be components.
127509.tagline: Clearly see which components you're using and where they come from.

plugins.name: QD - Magix - AI Text Generator
plugins.description:
Magix - AI Text Generator enables seamless text creation for your designs using OpenAI’s API.


After connecting the API, simply select the text elements (Text objects, Sticky notes or Shapes with text) you wish to generate. The plugin will automatically list them, allowing you to input custom prompts. With a single click on ‘Generate Content’ all selected text elements will be instantly generated and integrated into your design, streamlining your workflow.


AI Makes It Simple...
plugins.tagline: AI-Powered Text Generation - All Texts with One Click

122756.name: QD - Magix - AI Text Generator
122756.description:
Magix - AI Text Generator enables seamless text creation for your designs using OpenAI’s API.


After connecting the API, simply select the text elements (Text objects, Sticky notes or Shapes with text) you wish to generate. The plugin will automatically list them, allowing you to input custom prompts. With a single click on ‘Generate Content’ all selected text elements will be instantly generated and integrated into your design, streamlining your workflow.


AI Makes It Simple...

networkAccess.reasoning: This plugin requires access to the OpenAI API to generate text. and moeinsaboohi to load header image.

122756.release_notes:
I’m constantly working to improve Magix for a better experience. If you have any suggestions or encounter any issues, feel free to share them! 😊

Version 3 Release Notes:
•  Improved UI and UX for a smoother experience
•  Fixed plugin issues in FigJam
•  Added text generation support for sticky notes and text-based shapes
•  Enhanced state message display
•  Resolved reported bugs
122756.tagline: AI-Powered Text Generation - All Texts with One Click

plugins.name: Scribe Guard - AI-powered Writing System Validator
plugins.description:
🎯 What is it?

A powerful AI tool that analyzes your text content against your writing system guidelines, ensuring perfect brand consistency and tone of voice alignment.


✨ Key Features

  1. AI-powered content analysis
  2. Writing system validation
  3. Style guide compliance checks
  4. Tone of voice verification
  5. Terminology consistency
  6. Real-time feedback


🚀 How to Use

  1. Upload your Writing System PDF
  2. Enter your ChatGPT API key
  3. Click "Analyze Copy"
  4. Review the detailed analysis


🛠️ What You'll Need

  1. ChatGPT API key
  2. Your writing system guidelines in PDF


🔒 Security Note

Your API key is handled securely and can be saved locally for convenience. All communications are encrypted and only happen through authorized channels.



The tool provides detailed feedback on tone, terminology, and style compliance, helping you maintain perfect brand consistency across all your content. No more manual checking - let AI do the heavy lifting! ✨
plugins.tagline: Validate your text content against writing system guidelines with AI-powered analysis

plugins.name: Template Manager
plugins.description:
Figma Template Saver


Description:

Effortlessly save and reuse entire Figma designs as templates while preserving frames, text, vectors, components, and precise positioning. This plugin ensures that every detail—fills, strokes, corner radius, and vector data—is accurately stored and replicated when applied to new files.


🔹 **Save any selection as a reusable template**

🔹 **Apply templates across different files with full fidelity**

🔹 **Preserve component instances, nested frames, vectors, and typography**

🔹 **Avoid missing fills or strokes with advanced capture logic**


Streamline your workflow and bring consistency to your designs—save once, apply anywhere! 🚀
plugins.tagline: **"Effortlessly save, reuse, and replicate Figma designs—preserve every detail with precision."**

plugins.name: Feed Names, Get Frames (16:9, 1280x720)
plugins.description:
This plugin allows to batch-create 1280*720px (16:9) frames with user-defined names.


The frames will be created in the centre of the viewport, unless something is in the way — in this case it will place them to the bottom right of the conflicting element, and the frames created will remain selected for further batch manipulation. Frame size works well for YouTube thumbnails.


Useful for established design workflows, especially centred around YouTube design, with high volumes and short turnaround times.


Assuming that 1 manual frame creation+naming takes 5 seconds, then for 10 frames the plugin increases the efficiency by x50. And even more for a larger number of frames.

accepted.name: Alexandra (Sasha) Hunter
accepted.description: I do graphic and product design.

plugins.tagline: Paste a list of titles — get frames with those titles

125014.name: Feed Names, Get Frames (16:9, 1280x720)
125014.description:
This plugin allows to batch-create 1280*720px (16:9) frames with user-defined names.


The frames will be created in the centre of the viewport, unless something is in the way — in this case it will place them to the bottom right of the conflicting element, and the frames created will remain selected for further batch manipulation. Frame size works well for YouTube thumbnails.


Useful for established design workflows, especially centred around YouTube design, with high volumes and short turnaround times.


Assuming that 1 manual frame creation+naming takes 5 seconds, then for 10 frames the plugin increases the efficiency by x50. And even more for a larger number of frames.
125014.tagline: Paste a list of titles — get frames with those titles

plugins.name: K Translation
plugins.description:
K Translation is a localization tool designed to simplify the process of translating your Figma frames into multiple languages using XLIFF files.


After installing the plugin, the user uploads an XLIFF file containing translations. The plugin analyzes the file, determines the source language, and lists available target languages.


The user then selects which languages to translate the frame into. To begin the translation, simply select a frame in Figma that contains text elements.


Once the "Create copy" button is pressed, the plugin automatically scans all the text within the frame and creates copies of the frame for each selected target language, effectively localizing your design with just a few click.
plugins.tagline: K Translation: localize Figma frames into multiple languages using XLIFF files in just a few clicks.

103740.name: K Translation
103740.description:
K Translation is a localization tool designed to simplify the process of translating your Figma frames into multiple languages using XLIFF files.


After installing the plugin, the user uploads an XLIFF file containing translations. The plugin analyzes the file, determines the source language, and lists available target languages.


The user then selects which languages to translate the frame into. To begin the translation, simply select a frame in Figma that contains text elements.


Once the "Create copy" button is pressed, the plugin automatically scans all the text within the frame and creates copies of the frame for each selected target language, effectively localizing your design with just a few click.
103740.release_notes: Added the ability to download a file containing texts that were not translated.
103740.tagline: K Translation: localize Figma frames into multiple languages using XLIFF files in just a few clicks.

plugins.name: Syncalise
plugins.description:
Because life is too short to manually copy translations, Syncalise beams the words from Lokalise straight into your Figma designs. ✨


Syncalise is a Figma plugin that:

  1. Talks to Lokalise via their API 🤝
  2. Lists all your translation keys & languages 🗝️
  3. Lets you slap any translation onto a selected text layer in a single click 🖱️
  4. Helps you annotate & export strings without the usual tears 💧


All that, wrapped in a tiny React app living comfortably inside Figma.


90-second quick start ⏱️

  1. Grab the plugin from Figma Community or clone this repo and build locally (see dev setup below).
  2. Open the plugin inside Figma → you'll land on Settings.
  3. Paste your Lokalise API token and hit Save. (We never send it anywhere except Lokalise – pinky promise.)
  4. Pick a project from the dropdown.
  5. Head over to the Keys tab, select your language, search a key and click it while a Figma text layer is selected.
  6. 💥 Boom – translated! Time to grab a coffee ☕.
plugins.tagline: The "Why-am-I-still-copy-pasting-strings?" Figma plugin

137558.name: Syncalise
137558.description:
Because life is too short to manually copy translations, Syncalise beams the words from Lokalise straight into your Figma designs. ✨


Syncalise is a Figma plugin that:

  1. Talks to Lokalise via their API 🤝
  2. Lists all your translation keys & languages 🗝️
  3. Lets you slap any translation onto a selected text layer in a single click 🖱️
  4. Helps you annotate & export strings without the usual tears 💧


All that, wrapped in a tiny React app living comfortably inside Figma.


90-second quick start ⏱️

  1. Grab the plugin from Figma Community or clone this repo and build locally (see dev setup below).
  2. Open the plugin inside Figma → you'll land on Settings.
  3. Paste your Lokalise API token and hit Save. (We never send it anywhere except Lokalise – pinky promise.)
  4. Pick a project from the dropdown.
  5. Head over to the Keys tab, select your language, search a key and click it while a Figma text layer is selected.
  6. 💥 Boom – translated! Time to grab a coffee ☕.

networkAccess.reasoning: Syncalise needs to access the Lokalise API to fetch projects and translations.

plugins.name: Figma to Unity Exporter
plugins.description:
### Tired of manually recreating your Figma designs in Unity?


Figma To Unity Importer is the ultimate workflow solution designed to bridge the gap between designers and developers. Stop wasting hours meticulously rebuilding UI and start converting your high-fidelity Figma designs into fully functional, native Unity uGUI components with just a few clicks.


**⚠️ IMPORTANT: This is one half of a powerful 2-part system.**

This Figma plugin exports your design data. To bring your designs to life in Unity, you need the professional importer asset from the Unity Asset Store.


---


### **➡️ Step 1: Get the Professional Unity Importer Asset**


To complete the workflow, please purchase and import the required companion asset from the Unity Asset Store. It's the engine that powers the entire import process in Unity, packed with advanced features to ensure a perfect conversion.


**[>> Get "Figma To Unity Importer" on the Unity Asset Store ($15) <<](https://assetstore.unity.com/preview/323342/1075296)**


---


### **✨ Key Features:**


* **Accurate Conversion:** Preserves layer hierarchy, names, positions, sizes, and rotations.

* **Advanced Text Support:** Exports text as TextMeshPro components, maintaining font family, **font weight (including variable fonts)**, size, and color.

* **Image Export:** Automatically exports image fills and creates native Unity `Image` components.

* **Resolution Scaling:** Scale your entire UI to different screen sizes automatically.

* **Smart & Simple UI:** Remembers your last used settings and supports multiple languages.


### **🚀 Workflow:**


**1. In Unity (Setup):**

* Purchase and import the importer from the Asset Store using the link above.

* Install the required packages as described in the asset's documentation (TextMeshPro, UI, Newtonsoft.Json).


**2. In Figma (Export):**

* Run this plugin.

* Select the single, top-level Frame you want to export.

* Configure your options (target resolution, include images, etc.).

* Click "Export" to download the `.zip` file.


**3. In Unity (Import):**

* Unzip the downloaded file.

* Drag the `FigmaExport` folder into your Unity `Assets`.

* Open the importer via `Tools > Figma Importer`.

* Assign the `hierarchy.json` file and click "Create UI".


That's it! Your design is now a native, ready-to-use UI in Unity.
plugins.tagline: The ultimate workflow bridge. Go from Figma design to a working Unity UI in minutes.

🔤 Ai Translate – Translate, Edit & Generate Text with AI


Ai TranslateAI is your all-in-one AI-powered text assistant inside Figma.


Effortlessly translate, edit, and generate content across your designs — without leaving your canvas. Perfect for designers, product teams, and localization workflows.


✨ Key Features:


🌍 Translate text layers instantly to multiple languages


✏️ Edit existing copy with AI suggestions


🧠 Generate new content powered by artificial intelligence


🗂 Works with selected text, frames, or the whole page


⚡ Fast, intuitive interface designed for creative flow
137176.tagline: Free  Text Translation , Edit Text  & Generate Text By AI

plugins.name: Typographica
plugins.description:
Typographica helps you quickly create beautiful and balanced font combinations for any project — from corporate dashboards to creative websites.


The plugin analyzes your chosen primary font, project style, and font metrics to generate harmonious font pairs automatically.


What does Typographica do?


  1. Generates Primary + Secondary + Accent font combinations
  2. Takes into account your project style (7 styles: business, corporate, modern, elegant, fun, personal, minimalist)
  3. Analyzes font metrics (x-height, glyph width, weight, stylistic characteristics)
  4. Automatically filters out fonts that do not fit the selected style
  5. Lets you save combinations as Figma text styles and variables
  6. Optionally adds smart descriptions to generated styles
  7. Supports manual swapping of secondary and accent fonts
  8. Works with any available fonts — Google Fonts, local fonts, and Figma-supported fonts


Who is it for?


  1. Product designers — to quickly build solid typography systems
  2. UX/UI designers — to improve readability and visual rhythm
  3. Brand designers — to find well-balanced and creative font pairs
  4. Beginners — to get guidance on what fonts work well together
  5. Experienced designers — to save time and explore unexpected combinations


How does it work?


  1. Choose your project style
  2. Select a Primary Font
  3. Click Change Pairs
  4. Browse the generated font pairs and accent options
  5. Save styles or variables in one click
  6. Tweak and refine as needed


Why use Typographica?


Save time — no more manual font pairing

Get better quality — pairs are based on font metrics and style fit, not guesswork

Flexible — works for classic and modern designs alike

Customizable — easy to adjust pairs or generate new ones on the fly


Styles and Tokens Support


Typographica not only generates font pairs, but also helps you create full-fledged text styles and design tokens in Figma.


You can save your Primary, Secondary, and Accent fonts as reusable Text Styles and optionally as Variables (Tokens) — making your typography consistent across your project and design system.


Style Description Table


Typographica can automatically generate a style description table for your font system — right inside Figma.


It creates a clear, editable table summarizing your Primary, Secondary, and Accent fonts, with suggested usage and style notes.


Perfect for documenting typography choices or sharing with your team and developers.


Typographica is your smart font pairing assistant in Figma. Make your typography cleaner, more beautiful, and more consistent — with less effort.

accepted.name: Andrei Kuznetsov
accepted.description: Templates, UI Kits, Design Systems, Plugins

plugins.tagline: Smart Font Pair Generator for Figma

plugins.name: Design to System
plugins.description:
Design to System is a Figma plugin that helps you convert your existing designs into a structured design system — effortlessly.

With just a few clicks, you can extract styles from your design, register them as local styles, and reapply them consistently across your file.


Key Features

  1. 🔍 Analyze Selection : Extracts all design style properties (colors, text styles, shadows) from the selected layers. Color values are automatically categorized into background, text, and stroke styles for easier organization.
  2. 📌 Register Styles : Registers the extracted styles into your Figma local styles panel. This enables consistent reuse and supports design system creation.
  3. 🎯 Apply Styles : Applies the registered local styles back to the selected design elements — ensuring consistency and systemization.
plugins.tagline: Turn your designs into a reusable system – automatically.

136167.name: Design to System
136167.description:

  3. 🎯 Apply Styles : Applies the registered local styles back to the selected design elements — ensuring consistency and systemization.
136167.tagline: Turn your designs into a reusable system – automatically.

plugins.name: Color Explorer
plugins.description:
🎨 What is Color Explorer?

Color Explorer is a smart Figma plugin designed to help designers, early-stage founders, agencies, strategists, DTC operators, and marketers quickly find the perfect color palettes for their brand.


With over 3,000+ curated palettes (increasing everyday), you can preview and apply full-brand color systems to any selected frame or layer—in one click.


🚀 Key Features

  1. Alpha-Safe Mapping: Automatically preserves transparency values (alpha channel)
  2. 3000+ Color Palettes: Handpicked and categorized palettes to match different brand moods and industries
  3. One-Click Apply: Instantly replace all fill/stroke/text colors in your selection
  4. Lightweight and Fast: Designed for speed and real-time creative flow


🔧 Use Cases

  1. Explore visual directions before committing to a brand look
  2. Save time in early-stage design sprints
  3. Quickly swap palettes in Figma without manual editing
  4. Present polished options to clients and stakeholders


💸 One-Time Purchase

Get lifetime access for a one-time fee of $10. No subscription. Free updates forever.
plugins.tagline: One Click to Try 3000+ Color Palettes on Your Design.

plugins.name: Token Architect
plugins.description:
Token Architect is a comprehensive design token management solution that bridges the gap between Figma and your development workflow. Create, export, and import design tokens with intelligent automation and bidirectional sync capabilities.


KEY FEATURES:

  1. Generate Complete Token Systems - Create comprehensive design tokens from a single brand colour with automatic shade generation
  2. Smart Color Palette Generation - Transform any colour into professional 100-900 shade scales with HSL-based algorithms
  3. Export Figma Variables - Convert your Figma variables into industry-standard JSON tokens
  4. Import External Tokens - Bring design tokens from popular tools (Style Dictionary, Design Tokens W3C) into Figma
  5. Advanced Token Classification - Automatic organisation into primitives and semantic token hierarchies
  6. Multi-Category Support - Colours, spacing, typography, responsive breakpoints, and semantic tokens
  7. Real-time Preview & Validation - Live JSON output with comprehensive debugging capabilities


PERFECT FOR:

  1. Design system managers building tokens from scratch or maintaining consistency
  2. Frontend developers implementing design tokens in modern frameworks
  3. Teams using tools like Style Dictionary, Tokens Studio, or custom token pipelines
  4. Organisations scaling design systems across products and platforms



Please reach out to ozarg.studio@gmail.com if you have any issues or would like to request a feature. Or let's connect on LinkedIn. Cool ideas welcome :)

accepted.name: OZAR STUDIO
accepted.description: We are a design studio working worldwide . We provide a range of services and  offer a series of products for businesses you can access from our website.

plugins.tagline: Export and Import your variables in a developer-friendy way
